code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const titleMap={breakfast:'Breakfast',lunch:'Lunch',snacks:'Snacks',dinner:'Dinner'};function annotate(line){if(!line)return'';// Split by comma and wrap tokens containing Non-Veg / Veg markers return line.split(/,(?![^()]*\))/).map(seg=>{const trimmed=seg.trim();if(/non\s*-?veg|chicken|egg|mutton|fish|biryani/i.test(trimmed)){return"".concat(trimmed,"");}if(/(veg[:]?|paneer|dal|idly|dosa|paratha|rice|curd|chutney|sambar)/i.test(trimmed)){return"".concat(trimmed,"");}return trimmed;}).join(', ');}const MessMenu=_ref=>{let{menu,cycleMeta}=_ref;const normalized=menu||{};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mess-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Mess Menu ",cycleMeta&&cycleMeta.weekType&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{fontSize:'0.7rem',marginLeft:8,opacity:0.6},children:cycleMeta.weekType==='week13'?'Week 1&3':'Week 2&4'})]}),Object.keys(titleMap).map(key=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"meal-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"meal-title",children:titleMap[key]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"meal-items",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:annotate(normalized[key])||'—'}})]},key)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"legend",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"legend-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"box veg"}),"Veg"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"legend-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"box nonveg"}),"Non-Veg"]})]})]});};export default MessMenu;
